Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}

{3: 'Your letters have not been especially frequent. Sometimes you get one a week, sometimes one the entire month. There have even been times when you receive a letter and forget to reply until much later. In any case, the letters between Iris and you have never stopped.'}
{3: 'Like an hourglass, the grains of time kept slipping by, and recently, the innocent little girl has been showing greater maturity.'}
{3: 'You have begun to grow ever closer.'}
{3: 'Despite this, Iris has never overstepped the boundaries.'}
{3: 'One could argue that you were close, but then again, you have never met.'}
{3: "One could also argue that you were not close, but then again, being pen pals, you know each other's deepest secrets."}
{3: 'One day, Iris started sending gifts along with her letters.'}
{3: 'They were generally trinkets.'}
{1: 'Our teacher at the Center of Basic Public Education took us to the greenhouse today for an observation.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'In a sense, it was to provide hands-on education in understanding the makeup of plants.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'It was my first time seeing such vibrant flowers in bloom and in that moment, all that I could think of was how true that line was—', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"God expects answers for the flowers he sends us, not for the sun and the earth."', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Oh yes, and among those flowers was a purple one that was exceedingly beautiful.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It might have been an Iris, a flower you previously mentioned.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It was my first time seeing something so beautiful.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But my teacher plucked that flower and deconstructed it so that we could understand what was inside.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Its remnants were scattered within the petri dish for us to observe, and looking at it, I lost my desire to learn more. I just felt lost and miserable.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '<para\\>Although from a logical perspective, the flower had fulfilled its purpose.<para\\>We had maximized the benefits gained from its existence and I suppose something good came out of it.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "But I feel it shouldn't have been that way. Perhaps there could have been a more fitting ending for it.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Let it silently bloom and be held in appreciation by those who view it, before withering with no regrets...', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The life cycle of a flower is nothing short of a miracle.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "But we can't spare the time to admire this miracle.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "We've been educated to use the most efficient method to achieve our goal and get the results.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "We've lost the ability to admire beauty in our pursuit of maximum efficiency.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'This disheartens me.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'And then I started relating that to myself.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "My music, my opera, my art, and everything about me... doesn't seem to hold any value in this world.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "They won't be of help to anyone, nor will anyone take notice of them... Should I even continue doing these? I'm at a loss.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'What do you think? 【kuroname】.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Oh yes, I begged the teacher to leave me the remnants of the flower. I took them home, dried them and put them back together to make a bookmark.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>I can't be sure whether I'll ever see such a beautiful flower again,<para\\>so I wedged it between the folds of the letter and I hope you'll be able to smell its lingering fragrance.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'There is a dried flower contained within the letter.'}
{3: 'Even though the color has faded, the beautiful purple still remains ever vivid within its grooves.'}
{3: 'You place it on your desk, then pick up your pen to continue writing.'}
{1: 'Iris:', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I wonder if you have ever heard such a saying:', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Keep moving forward,"', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Do not linger to gather and preserve the petals."', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Paved is your path—"', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"With flowers blooming as nature intends."', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'After a brief while, you receive a reply.'}
{1: "Thank you for your letter, 【kuroname】. You don't know how much those words mean to me.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "You're absolutely right.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Just simply "wanting" will never result in anything, so I have chosen to take action.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "You can't make excuses for yourself to escape by simply not having a stage, an actor, or the fear of being misunderstood.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I can't keep burying myself in my creative work and forget that it's more important to use them to reach out to others.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Therefore, I plan to use robots to perform the opera that I wrote and reproduced.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I contacted the manager of the Virtual Exhibition Hall and they agreed to provide me with an area to hold my performance.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Tomorrow will be the premiere, and truth to be told, I'm feeling very nervous.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm confident in my project, but I'm also terrified of the criticism and lack of understanding I'll get.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The contradiction within my heart is tormenting me.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "By the time you read this, I'll probably already have performed the first show at the Exhibition Hall.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '【kuroname】, do you think it will be a success?', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "No matter whether it'll be successful, I just hope that as you read this letter, you'll pray for my success.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Even though we've never met, I feel that right now, you're the person that understands me the most.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Phew, the letter is sent.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She then looks at the robot beside her.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Time to fight my "battle".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She closes her eyes and looks resolutely at the Exhibition Hall.'}
{1: 'My dearest 【kuroname】:', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't know how to express my inner joy with you. Only at this moment, I think these words lack in tenor.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'I keep imagining that if you were to be standing in front of me at this moment, I would hug you and share my happiness with you.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Such elegant writing, like a soaring dragon and dancing phoenix, etched within the paper, so warmly proclaims the happiness and enthusiasm of the writer.'}

{1: "I can't help but be thankful that I wasn't about to do it. Otherwise, others would consider my actions inappropriate.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Not long ago, I mentioned my decision to perform my opera at the Virtual Exhibition Hall.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'To be honest, it got off to a terrible start. No one wanted to stop and spend time watching something like that.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I was despondent, and then a girl showed up.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'She gave me affirmation. She said my opera was fascinating and she wanted to see what would happen next.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'She was an artist and even said she wanted to help provide illustrations for the scenes.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'My work inspired another creator to produce a new artwork.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "There is no greater honor than this! I feel so happy! It's the most precious thing in the world!", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "From that moment on, my feelings of despondency vanished, I still felt that it's all been worth it.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "So what if I only have an audience of one? I'll continue creating new works and writing operas.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Oh right, her name is...', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'This line is scratched out, forcefully.'}
{1: "No, I shouldn't give you her name without her permission.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "In any case, we've become very close friends, so let me just call her A.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I wish I could introduce A to you! You'd like her, I'm sure and she'd definitely like you too!", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Perhaps there's no need for introductions. After all, Babylonia's pretty small and who knows, we might already have met somewhere.", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Perhaps when we actually meet someday, we'll stare at each other's face and simultaneously exclaim:", 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Oh, so that was you back then.', 2: '0000ffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
